docs.snippet: Coach John Calipari said the Wildcats had lost their “mojo” until he made a secret adjustment....
docs.lead_paragraph: Coach John Calipari said the Wildcats had lost their “mojo” until he made a secret adjustment.
docs.abstract: Kentucky men's basketball coach John Calipari, busy preparing his team for national title game against Connecticut, credits mysterious 'tweak' to Kentucky's offense for turning their season around.

headline.main: Calipari Credits a Mysterious ‘Tweak’ With Turning Kentucky’s Season Around
headline.print_headline: Calipari Credits a Mysterious ‘Tweak’ With Turning Kentucky’s Season Around

docs.snippet: The Huskies guard Ryan Boatright possesses a defensive philosophy that mirrors that of his coach, Kevin Ollie, and it has made life difficult on opposing point guards....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Huskies guard Ryan Boatright possesses a defensive philosophy that mirrors that of his coach, Kevin Ollie, and it has made life difficult on opposing point guards.
docs.abstract: Profile of Connecticut guard Ryan Boatright, whose tenacity on defense has made life difficult on opposing point guards and has been key to UConn's success in NCAA men's basketball tournament.

headline.seo: Ryan Boatright of UConn Sticks Opponent’s Best Shooter

docs.snippet: Alternative broadcasts of N.C.A.A. tournament games feature hometown announcers with a brash but entertaining subjectivity....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alternative broadcasts of N.C.A.A. tournament games feature hometown announcers with a brash but entertaining subjectivity.
docs.abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column on NCAA Final Four teamcasts; holds that former Kentucky star Rex Chapman's brash subjectivity kept viewers engaged and made the game more entertaining.

headline.main: With a Holler, Homers Make N.C.A.A. Broadcasts Fun
headline.print_headline: With a Holler, Homers Make Broadcasts Fun

docs.snippet: For university presidents like Susan Herbst, the Final Four offers a rare opportunity for an extended bonding session with key supporters who are basking in the glow of big-time sports success....
docs.lead_paragraph: For university presidents like Susan Herbst, the Final Four offers a rare opportunity for an extended bonding session with key supporters who are basking in the glow of big-time sports success.
docs.abstract: NCAA Final Four, among the biggest shows in sports, is a priceless opportunity for a university to burnish its national reputation and introduce itself to millions of viewers; for university presidents like Susan Herbst, political science professor who has been at the helm of Connecticut for almost three years, it also offers rare opportunity for an extended bonding session with key supporters who are basking in the glow of big-time sports success.

headline.main: For UConn, as Well as the Huskies, a Golden Opportunity to Impress
headline.print_headline: Huskies’ Run Gives UConn a Chance to Impress Also

docs.snippet: Alonzo Mourning, a defensive specialist who came back from a kidney transplant to win an NBA title with the Miami Heat, was among those named to the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alonzo Mourning, a defensive specialist who came back from a kidney transplant to win an NBA title with the Miami Heat, was among those named to the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Mourning Headlines List of Hall of Fame's Class of 2014

docs.snippet: The president, Mark Emmert, and organization officials said an overhaul would look to give the power conferences the autonomy to provide some things athletes in a unionization effort are seeking....
docs.lead_paragraph: The president, Mark Emmert, and organization officials said an overhaul would look to give the power conferences the autonomy to provide some things athletes in a unionization effort are seeking.
docs.abstract: NCAA expects its membership to approve a template for overhaul that would give athletes at least some of the benefits they are seeking in hopes of staving off the union effort; basic idea is to give autonomy to the five so-called power conferences in college athletics, allowing them to provide additional benefits to their athletes.

headline.main: N.C.A.A. Planning to Address Benefits for Some of Its Players, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: N.C.A.A. Planning to Address Benefits for Some of Its Players, Officials Say

docs.snippet: Lance Stephenson shook his head in disbelief. All-Star starter Paul George repeatedly urged his Indiana teammates to get going, and All-Star center Roy Hibbert sat speechless on the bench during the final 30 minutes on the game....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lance Stephenson shook his head in disbelief. All-Star starter Paul George repeatedly urged his Indiana teammates to get going, and All-Star center Roy Hibbert sat speechless on the bench during the final 30 minutes on the game.

headline.main: Struggling Pacers Still Looking for Way to Rebound
headline.print_headline: Struggling Pacers Still Looking for Way to Rebound
